relation: Made with Creature Editor 3.0, a piece of software that was made before the Spore Creature Creator was released, as a 2D mock-up of it.
Made using the original sprite as a reference, especially for colour, since I was trying to preserve the pinkness that the original had.
Mad Taxi. This was done pretty much fully with the smudge tool in Photoshop.
textBeforeTable: > Z Y W U T S R P O N M L K J I H G F E D C B A 8 7 < Other Submissions by ozwalled added an orange background, which I thought worked better. One of the lead EB64 characters.
